text: Actor Charlie Sheen has defended a Tweet in which expressed his hope that US president - elect Donald Trump will be the next celebrity to die. The 51 year old former Two And A Half Men star posted a message on Twitter which read : ` ` Dear God, Trump next please!'' shortly after the death of actress Debbie Reynolds was announced. He signed off the tweet with an emoji of a middle finger. Dear God ; Trump next, please! Trump next, please! Trump next, please! Trump next, please! Trump next, please!
